name: CS_start
description: Overall soil carbon (usually sum of C1 - C3)

name: k1
description: transfer rate from C1 to CA

name: k2
description: transfer rate from C2 to CA

name: k3
description: transfer rate from C3 to CA

name: r1
description: transfer rate from C1 to C2

name: r2
description: transfer rate from C2 to C3

name: kSM
description: transfer rate from CS or CA to CM

name: f
description: Scaling parameter for heterotrophic respirationa (no units)
